title: OceanXplorers
overview: OceanXplorers takes audiences aboard an advanced scientific research vessel, OceanXplorer, to investigate the farthest frontiers of the world's oceans, 80% of which are entirely unexplored. Combining a high-end, science-driven documentary with breathtaking sequences to capture the drama and thrill of exploration, the six-part series is a high-stakes adventure in ocean discovery.
